title: Potato charlottes with smoked trout
ingredients: ['400g waxy potatoes', '2 tbsp olive oil', '1 tbsp white wine vinegar', '2 tsp chopped fresh dill', '125g smoked trout', '4 tsp lemon juice', 'salt and freshly ground white pepper', 'TO GARNISH', '1 lemon, cut into wedges', 'sprigs of fresh dill']
